title: How to Download WeChat Videos on an iPhone or iPad

steps.title: Tap Chats in WeChat.
steps.content: Tap Chats in WeChat. This is found at the bottom left-hand corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap the conversation that contains the video you want to download.
steps.content: Tap the conversation that contains the video you want to download. If you have several different chats in your account’s history, you may need to scroll down to find the person you were chatting with that sent you the video you want to download.

steps.title: After a second or so, a list of options will appear.
steps.content: After a second or so, a list of options will appear.

steps.title: This will give you additional option icons at the bottom of the screen.
steps.content: This will give you additional option icons at the bottom of the screen. You may have to tap ▶ first to see this option.

steps.title: Tap ⋯.
steps.content: Tap ⋯ . You'll see this at the bottom of the screen. This will bring up further additional options.

steps.title: This downloads the selected video to your phone or tablet.
steps.content: This downloads the selected video to your phone or tablet. You can now watch the video in your Photos app.
